Class Skipgram

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.core.Skipgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
Op
@Operator public final class Skipgram extends RawOp
Parses a text file and creates a batch of examples.

  • Method Details

    • create

      @Endpoint(describeByClass=true) public static Skipgram create(Scope scope, String filename, Long batchSize, Skipgram.Options... options)
      Factory method to create a class wrapping a new Skipgram operation.
      Parameters:
      scope - current scope
      filename - The corpus's text file name.
      batchSize - The size of produced batch.
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of Skipgram

    • windowSize

      public static Skipgram.Options windowSize(Long windowSize)
      Sets the windowSize option.
      Parameters:
      windowSize - The number of words to predict to the left and right of the target.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • minCount

      public static Skipgram.Options minCount(Long minCount)
      Sets the minCount option.
      Parameters:
      minCount - The minimum number of word occurrences for it to be included in the vocabulary.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • subsample

      public static Skipgram.Options subsample(Float subsample)
      Sets the subsample option.
      Parameters:
      subsample - Threshold for word occurrence. Words that appear with higher frequency will be randomly down-sampled. Set to 0 to disable.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.

    • vocabWord

      public Output<TString> vocabWord()
      Gets vocabWord. A vector of words in the corpus.
      Returns:
      vocabWord.

    • vocabFreq

      public Output<TInt32> vocabFreq()
      Gets vocabFreq. Frequencies of words. Sorted in the non-ascending order.
      Returns:
      vocabFreq.

    • wordsPerEpoch

      public Output<TInt64> wordsPerEpoch()
      Gets wordsPerEpoch. Number of words per epoch in the data file.
      Returns:
      wordsPerEpoch.

    • currentEpoch

      public Output<TInt32> currentEpoch()
      Gets currentEpoch. The current epoch number.
      Returns:
      currentEpoch.

    • totalWordsProcessed

      public Output<TInt64> totalWordsProcessed()
      Gets totalWordsProcessed. The total number of words processed so far.
      Returns:
      totalWordsProcessed.

    • examples

      public Output<TInt32> examples()
      Gets examples. A vector of word ids.
      Returns:
      examples.
